FuncDef: The display software crl command displays information about a digital signature certificate revocation list (CRL) file.
Examples: Slot ID           Publisher                                                                         Issue Date                      Status
17                  C=CN,O=Huawei,CN=Huawei Code Signing Certificate Authority                        2019-02-15 01:55:27             Valid
18                  C=CN,O=Huawei,CN=Huawei Code Signing Certificate Authority                        2019-02-15 01:55:27             Valid
Package digital signature verification failure list:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If an issued digital signature certificate needs to be revoked due to key disclosure or other reasons, a third-party tool can be used to mark the certificate invalid and add the certificate to a digital certificate CRL. To check information about the digital signature CRL file, run the display software crl command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
